Additional data not in original description . Body length 4.2–6.1 mm , width in dorsal view 2.1–2.7 mm . Male genitalia . Median lobe relatively large, 1.16 mm , (1/4 to 1/5 body length), strongly curved, apically constricted in lateral view and tip ( Figs. 5A, 5B ), paired apodemes 1.10 X 0.15 mm . Spiculum gastrale 1.70 mm X 0.60 mm , asymmetrical and complex apically where it adheres strongly to the sternum 8, evenly curved along length, with lightly sclerotized, oblong base. Apical portion with lateral double-pronged projections offset ca. 20 ° from perpendicular with three or four seta on rounded apices. Female genitalia . Spermatheca C-shaped, enlarged portion with two ducts connected to tapered extension ( Fig. 5F ), length from extension to ducts 0.35 mm .
